document.docAuthor: Ziani, Stefano, Abdel-Dayem, Mahmoud Saleh, Aldhafer, Hathal Mohammed & Barbero, Enrico
document.masterDocTitle: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Genier, F. & Moretto, P.
bibRefCitation.refString: Genier, F. & Moretto, P. (2017). Digitonthophagus Balthasar, 1959: taxonomy, systematics, and morphological phylogeny of the genus revealing an African species complex (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae). subSubSection.paragraph:
Literature quotes.
SAUDI
ARABIA
: Asir Province ,
35 km N Mahayl
[=Muhayil] (1850′N, 4158′E)
. Madinah Prov- ince, Hedjaz (2430′N, 3830′E).
Makkah Province , Lith, 10 mi. inland (209′N 4016′E); Wadi
Jizan (2137′N 3910′E);
12 mi. N Jidda
[=Jeddah] (2138′15′′N 3913′35’’E) ( Génier & Moretto, 2017 )
.
YEMEN
: Aden Governorate , Aden (1245′56’’N 451′1’’E). Al Hudaydah Governorate , Kamaran Island (1520′N 4235′E)
. Lahij Governorate , Lahij (133′N 4453′E). Ta’izz Governorate , Taizz (1334′N 442′E) ( Génier & Moretto 2017 ).

Distribution. Arabian Peninsula:
Saudi Arabia
, Yemen . Africa: Djibouti , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Somalia ( Génier & Moretto 2017 ).

: Muscat governorate , “Mintaqat Masqat , Mascat (2336′48’’N 5835′36’’E)” ( Génier & Moretto, 2017 ).

Distribution. Arabian Peninsula : Oman ( Génier & Moretto 2017 ). Africa : Benin , Burkina Faso , Cameroon , Chad , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Gambia , Mali , Mauritania , Niger , Nigeria , Senegal , Sudan ( Génier & Moretto 2017 ).

Remarks . First established records for
Saudi Arabia
and Yemen .
After the revision of Génier & Moretto (2017) , the following citations:

-
Onthophagus catta (Fabricius)
:
Saudi Arabia
, Asir region , Ha’il region . Yemen ( Paulian 1948 );

-
Onthophagus gazella (Fabricius)
:
Saudi Arabia
, “Hedjaz” (d’Orbigny 1898c). Yemen , “ Aden ” (d’Orbigny 1898c); “ Lahej ” ( Balthasar 1972 ). “Arabie” ( Baraud 1987 );

-
Onthophagus ( Digitonthophagus ) gazella (Fabricius)
: “Arabien” ( Balthasar 1963 ).
Saudi Arabia
, “Wadi Hesua nr. Wadi ad Villa” ( Zunino 1979 );

-
Digitonthophagus gazella (Fabricius)
:
Saudi Arabia
, “Bahara”; “Al Hakimah”; “Selouly Farm”; “Ad Darba”; “Gizan”; “Sharoura” ( Zunino 1981 ). Yemen (Rössner in
Ziani et al . 2015
),

should be referred to as either
D. aksumensis
or
D. eucatta
.
